name: BadGuy's Escape to Comodo - ZAM
description:
It's a place of adventure BadGuy's Escape to Comodo is a game where you explore a huge open world, take on the role of a man on the run. You can explore a huge variety of terrain, including procedurally generated deserts, mountains, cities and towns. To help you on your quest, Escape to Comodo includes a variety of guns, headwear, and clothing to help enhance the roleplaying experience. Players can also build their own story, choose from hundreds of options, and customize their character with different outfits, gear, and hats. When you venture out on a quest, you can choose to drive, explore, or carry on foot through a nearly infinite land.

ALL CHAPTER'S BUNDLE DISCOUNT

Chapter 1: ZAM

A street thug on the run you are holding the key to power for the conclave back at the hideout on Comodo Island. Can you evade the police and A.R.M. Special forces on your mad dash to escape the state of ZAM.
